And<S>2532</S> certain men<S>5100</S> which came down<S>2718</S> from<S>575</S> Judaea<S>2449</S> taught<S>1321</S> the brethren<S>80</S>, and said,<S>3754</S> Except<S>3362</S> ye be circumcised<S>4059</S> after the manner<S>1485</S> of Moses<S>3475</S>, ye cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> be saved<S>4982</S>.
When therefore<S>3767</S> Paul<S>3972</S> and<S>2532</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> had<S>1096</S> no<S>3756</S> small<S>3641</S> dissension<S>4714</S> and<S>2532</S> disputation<S>4803</S> with<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, they determined<S>5021</S> that Paul<S>3972</S> and<S>2532</S> Barnabas<S>921</S>, and<S>2532</S> certain<S>5100</S> other<S>243</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S>, should go up<S>305</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S> unto<S>4314</S> the apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> elders<S>4245</S> about<S>4012</S> this<S>5127</S> question<S>2213</S>.
And<S>3303</S> <S>3767</S> being brought on their way<S>4311</S> by<S>5259</S> the church<S>1577</S>, they passed through<S>1330</S> Phenice<S>5403</S> and<S>2532</S> Samaria<S>4540</S>, declaring<S>1555</S> the conversion<S>1995</S> of the Gentiles<S>1484</S>: and<S>2532</S> they caused<S>4160</S> great<S>3173</S> joy<S>5479</S> unto all<S>3956</S> the brethren<S>80</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when they were come<S>3854</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, they were received<S>588</S> of<S>5259</S> the church<S>1577</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> elders<S>4245</S>, and<S>5037</S> they declared<S>312</S> all things<S>3745</S> that God<S>2316</S> had done<S>4160</S> with<S>3326</S> them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> there rose up<S>1817</S> certain<S>5100</S> of<S>575</S> the sect<S>139</S> of the Pharisees<S>5330</S> which believed<S>4100</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, That<S>3754</S> it was needful<S>1163</S> to circumcise<S>4059</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>5037</S> to command<S>3853</S> them to keep<S>5083</S> the law<S>3551</S> of Moses<S>3475</S>. <sup>rose: or, rose up, said they, certain</sup>
And<S>1161</S> the apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> elders<S>4245</S> came together<S>4863</S> for to consider<S>1492</S> of<S>4012</S> this<S>5127</S> matter<S>3056</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when there had been<S>1096</S> much<S>4183</S> disputing<S>4803</S>, Peter<S>4074</S> rose up<S>450</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, Men<S>435</S> and brethren<S>80</S>, ye<S>5210</S> know<S>1987</S> how that<S>3754</S> a good<S>744</S> while<S>2250</S> ago<S>575</S> God<S>2316</S> made choice<S>1586</S> among<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>, that the Gentiles<S>1484</S> by<S>1223</S> my<S>3450</S> mouth<S>4750</S> should hear<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S>, and<S>2532</S> believe<S>4100</S>.
And<S>2532</S> God<S>2316</S>, which knoweth the hearts<S>2589</S>, bare them<S>846</S> witness<S>3140</S>, giving<S>1325</S> them<S>846</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, even<S>2532</S> as<S>2531</S> he did unto us<S>2254</S>;
And<S>2532</S> put<S>1252</S> no<S>3762</S> difference<S>1252</S> between<S>3342</S> <S>5037</S> us<S>2257</S> and<S>2532</S> them<S>846</S>, purifying<S>2511</S> their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S> by faith<S>4102</S>.
Now<S>3568</S> therefore<S>3767</S> why<S>5101</S> tempt ye<S>3985</S> God<S>2316</S>, to put<S>2007</S> a yoke<S>2218</S> upon<S>1909</S> the neck<S>5137</S> of the disciples<S>3101</S>, which<S>3739</S> neither<S>3777</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S> nor<S>3777</S> we<S>2249</S> were able<S>2480</S> to bear<S>941</S>?
But<S>235</S> we believe<S>4100</S> that through<S>1223</S> the grace<S>5485</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> we shall be saved<S>4982</S>, even<S>2596</S> <S>3739</S> as<S>5158</S> they<S>2548</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> all<S>3956</S> the multitude<S>4128</S> kept silence<S>4601</S>, and<S>2532</S> gave audience<S>191</S> to Barnabas<S>921</S> and<S>2532</S> Paul<S>3972</S>, declaring<S>1834</S> what<S>3745</S> miracles<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S> God<S>2316</S> had wrought<S>4160</S> among<S>1722</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> by<S>1223</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> after<S>3326</S> they had held<S>4601</S> their<S>846</S> peace<S>4601</S>, James<S>2385</S> answered<S>611</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Men<S>435</S> and brethren<S>80</S>, hearken<S>191</S> unto me<S>3450</S>:
Simeon<S>4826</S> hath declared<S>1834</S> how<S>2531</S> God<S>2316</S> at the first<S>4412</S> did visit<S>1980</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, to take<S>2983</S> out of<S>1537</S> them a people<S>2992</S> for<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>2532</S> to this<S>5129</S> agree<S>4856</S> the words<S>3056</S> of the prophets<S>4396</S>; as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>,
After<S>3326</S> this<S>5023</S> I will return<S>390</S>, and<S>2532</S> will build again<S>456</S> the tabernacle<S>4633</S> of David<S>1138</S>, which<S>3588</S> is fallen down<S>4098</S>; and<S>2532</S> I will build again<S>456</S> the ruins<S>2679</S> thereof<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> I will set<S>461</S> it<S>846</S> up<S>461</S>:
That<S>3704</S> <S>302</S> the residue<S>2645</S> of men<S>444</S> might seek after<S>1567</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, upon<S>1909</S> whom<S>3739</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S> is called<S>1941</S> <S>1909</S> <S>846</S>, saith<S>3004</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, who<S>3588</S> doeth<S>4160</S> all<S>3956</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
Known<S>1110</S> unto God<S>2316</S> are<S>2076</S> all<S>3956</S> his<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning of the world<S>165</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> my<S>1473</S> sentence is<S>2919</S>, that we trouble<S>3926</S> not<S>3361</S> them, which<S>3588</S> from among<S>575</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> are turned<S>1994</S> to<S>1909</S> God<S>2316</S>:
But<S>235</S> that we write<S>1989</S> unto them<S>846</S>, that they abstain<S>567</S> from<S>575</S> pollutions<S>234</S> of idols<S>1497</S>, and<S>2532</S> from fornication<S>4202</S>, and<S>2532</S> from things strangled<S>4156</S>, and<S>2532</S> from blood<S>129</S>.
For<S>1063</S> Moses<S>3475</S> of<S>1537</S> old<S>744</S> time<S>1074</S> hath<S>2192</S> in every<S>2596</S> city<S>4172</S> them that preach<S>2784</S> him<S>846</S>, being read<S>314</S> in<S>1722</S> the synagogues<S>4864</S> every<S>2596</S> <S>3956</S> sabbath day<S>4521</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> pleased it<S>1380</S> the apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> elders<S>4245</S>, with<S>4862</S> the whole<S>3650</S> church<S>1577</S>, to send<S>3992</S> chosen<S>1586</S> men<S>435</S> of<S>1537</S> their own company<S>846</S> to<S>1519</S> Antioch<S>490</S> with<S>4862</S> Paul<S>3972</S> and<S>2532</S> Barnabas<S>921</S>; namely, Judas<S>2455</S> surnamed<S>1941</S> Barsabas<S>923</S>, and<S>2532</S> Silas<S>4609</S>, chief<S>2233</S> men<S>435</S> among<S>1722</S> the brethren<S>80</S>:
And they wrote<S>1125</S> letters by<S>1223</S> them<S>5495</S> <S>846</S> after this manner<S>3592</S>; The apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> elders<S>4245</S> and<S>2532</S> brethren<S>80</S> send greeting<S>5463</S> unto the brethren<S>80</S> which<S>3588</S> are of<S>1537</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> in<S>2596</S> Antioch<S>490</S> and<S>2532</S> Syria<S>4947</S> and<S>2532</S> Cilicia<S>2791</S>:
Forasmuch as<S>1894</S> we have heard<S>191</S>, that<S>3754</S> certain<S>5100</S> which went out<S>1831</S> from<S>1537</S> us<S>2257</S> have troubled<S>5015</S> you<S>5209</S> with words<S>3056</S>, subverting<S>384</S> your<S>5216</S> souls<S>5590</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Ye must be circumcised<S>4059</S>, and<S>2532</S> keep<S>5083</S> the law<S>3551</S>: to whom<S>3739</S> we gave<S>1291</S> no<S>3756</S> such commandment<S>1291</S>:
It seemed good<S>1380</S> unto us<S>2254</S>, being assembled<S>1096</S> with one accord<S>3661</S>, to send<S>3992</S> chosen<S>1586</S> men<S>435</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>4862</S> our<S>2257</S> beloved<S>27</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> and<S>2532</S> Paul<S>3972</S>,
Men<S>444</S> that have hazarded<S>3860</S> their<S>846</S> lives<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> the name<S>3686</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
We have sent<S>649</S> therefore<S>3767</S> Judas<S>2455</S> and<S>2532</S> Silas<S>4609</S>, who<S>846</S> shall<S>518</S> also<S>2532</S> tell<S>518</S> you the same things<S>846</S> by<S>1223</S> mouth<S>3056</S>. <sup>mouth: Gr. word</sup>
For<S>1063</S> it seemed good<S>1380</S> to the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> to us<S>2254</S>, to lay upon<S>2007</S> you<S>5213</S> no<S>3367</S> greater<S>4119</S> burden<S>922</S> than<S>4133</S> these<S>5130</S> necessary things<S>1876</S>;
That ye abstain<S>567</S> from meats offered to idols<S>1494</S>, and<S>2532</S> from blood<S>129</S>, and<S>2532</S> from things strangled<S>4156</S>, and<S>2532</S> from fornication<S>4202</S>: from<S>1537</S> which<S>3739</S> if ye keep<S>1301</S> yourselves<S>1438</S>, ye shall do<S>4238</S> well<S>2095</S>. Fare ye well<S>4517</S>.
So<S>3303</S> <S>3767</S> when they were dismissed<S>630</S>, they came<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> Antioch<S>490</S>: and<S>2532</S> when they had gathered<S>4863</S> the multitude<S>4128</S> together<S>4863</S>, they delivered<S>1929</S> the epistle<S>1992</S>:
Which when<S>1161</S> they had read<S>314</S>, they rejoiced<S>5463</S> for<S>1909</S> the consolation<S>3874</S>. <sup>consolation: or, exhortation</sup>
And Judas<S>2455</S> and<S>2532</S> Silas<S>4609</S>, being<S>5607</S> prophets<S>4396</S> also<S>2532</S> themselves<S>846</S>, exhorted<S>3870</S> the brethren<S>80</S> with<S>1223</S> many<S>4183</S> words<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> confirmed<S>1991</S> them.
And<S>1161</S> after they had tarried<S>4160</S> there a space<S>5550</S>, they were let go<S>630</S> in<S>3326</S> peace<S>1515</S> from<S>575</S> the brethren<S>80</S> unto<S>4314</S> the apostles<S>652</S>.
Notwithstanding<S>1161</S> it pleased<S>1380</S> Silas<S>4609</S> to abide<S>1961</S> there<S>847</S> still<S>1961</S>.
Paul<S>3972</S> also<S>1161</S> and<S>2532</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> continued<S>1304</S> in<S>1722</S> Antioch<S>490</S>, teaching<S>1321</S> and<S>2532</S> preaching<S>2097</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, with<S>3326</S> many<S>4183</S> others<S>2087</S> also<S>2532</S>.
And<S>1161</S> some<S>5100</S> days<S>2250</S> after<S>3326</S> Paul<S>3972</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> Barnabas<S>921</S>,<S>1211</S> Let us go again<S>1994</S> and visit<S>1980</S> our<S>2257</S> brethren<S>80</S> in<S>2596</S> every<S>3956</S> city<S>4172</S> where<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> we have preached<S>2605</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, and see how<S>4459</S> they do<S>2192</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> determined<S>1011</S> to take with them<S>4838</S> John<S>2491</S>, whose surname was<S>2564</S> Mark<S>3138</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Paul<S>3972</S> thought<S>515</S> not<S>3361</S> good<S>515</S> to take<S>4838</S> him<S>5126</S> with them<S>4838</S>, who<S>3588</S> departed<S>868</S> from<S>575</S> them<S>846</S> from<S>575</S> Pamphylia<S>3828</S>, and<S>2532</S> went<S>4905</S> not<S>3361</S> with them<S>846</S> to<S>1519</S> the work<S>2041</S>.
And<S>3767</S> the contention<S>3948</S> was<S>1096</S> so sharp<S>3948</S> between them<S>846</S>, that<S>5620</S> they departed asunder<S>673</S> one from the other<S>575</S> <S>240</S>: and so<S>5037</S> Barnabas<S>921</S> took<S>3880</S> Mark<S>3138</S>, and sailed<S>1602</S> unto<S>1519</S> Cyprus<S>2954</S>;
And<S>1161</S> Paul<S>3972</S> chose<S>1951</S> Silas<S>4609</S>, and departed<S>1831</S>, being recommended<S>3860</S> by<S>5259</S> the brethren<S>80</S> unto the grace<S>5485</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he went through<S>1330</S> Syria<S>4947</S> and<S>2532</S> Cilicia<S>2791</S>, confirming<S>1991</S> the churches<S>1577</S>.
